RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 27, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 27, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Prefer red).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EIDA'S STORM rated off leaders to the turn, rallied in the drive to go clear in the final sixteenth under good handling to the wire. QUIET DAWN chased pace to the stretch, no match for the winner. MY ROSIE speed to the front from off rail, angled inside turn but weakened. POQUITO ROSE quick speed front gate, could not keep up, faded in stretch. SHANNON'S GIRL never a factor throughout. RACE WAS HAND TIMED

ENTRY.NAME: Eida's Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated off leaders to the turn, rallied in the drive to go clear

ENTRY.NAME: Poquito Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick speed front gate, could not keep up, faded in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Shannon's Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: never a factor throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Quiet Dawn
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to the stretch, no match for the winner

ENTRY.NAME: My Rosie
ENTRY.OWNER: Riley Barbara J and Ouzts Toni
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front from off rail, angled inside turn, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Claiming Purse 9100. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAINWATER chased leader to far turn, raced on wrong lead through the stretch run bore in with a bumping incident in the final furlong. LA CHAPEAU settled inside while gaining the lead with a bumping incident in the final furlong. ARTEMUS SWEETHEART settled back from inside to far turn, rallied along for show. SHE'S A KEEPER speed to the front, bore out into far turn and backed up in the stretch. BASILICA D ORO had a terrible start from gate, never threatened throughout. DOGWOODS BECCA good position early while backing up readily. THE RIDER OF NUMBER 6 LA CHAPEAU CLAIMED A FOUL AGAINST NUMBER 5 RAINWATER FOR INTERFERIENCE THROUGH THE LATE STRETCH, AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW, RAINWATER WAS DISQUALIFIED AND PLACED SECOND MAKING LA CHAPEAU THE OFFICAL WINNER. Per Stewards ruling following a positive test LE CHAPEAU was disqualified and deemed unplaced.

ENTRY.NAME: Artemus Sweetheart
ENTRY.OWNER: Borchetta Mike Borchetta Martha and Borchetta Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back from inside to far turn, rallied along for show

ENTRY.NAME: Dogwoods Becca
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position early while backing up readily

ENTRY.NAME: Basilica D Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: terrible start from gate, never threatened throughout

ENTRY.NAME: She's a Keeper
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, bore out into far turn and backed up stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Rainwater
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to far turn, raced on wrong lead stretch bore in

ENTRY.NAME: dq-La Chapeau
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside while gaining the lead with a bumping in stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Allowance Purse 26200. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 27, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).). ).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPARKLING JEWEL sharp from the gate, speed to front, overtaken to the turn, re-rallied and came back to clear off in the stretch. SOFT TALK good speed, cleared to the stretch while no match for winner. LATE DATE no speed to the stretch, rallied up for the show spot late. NANA ROZE raced along evenly with no late response when needed. REYS PINA COLADA flashed brief speed while backing up from the turn. SWEETER THAN HONEY never menaced throughout. RACE WAS HAND TIMED.

ENTRY.NAME: Late Date
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the stretch, rallied up for the show spot late

ENTRY.NAME: Reys Pina Colada
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed brief speed while backing up from the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Soft Talk
ENTRY.OWNER: Rankin Bobby R and Johnson Charles W
ENTRY.COMMENT: good speed, cleared to the stretch, no match for winner

ENTRY.NAME: Nana Roze
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Sparkling Jewel
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp from the gate, speed to front, overtaken, came back cleared

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC & WinStar Farm LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Sweeter Than Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since March 27, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Regist ered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUCKY US sharp speed to the front, maintained control throughout. DANCE ON OVER good position throughout while no match for the winner. MY ANGELICA raced back to the stretch, moved up late for show spot. MOON PARTY good position throughout with no late kick in the drive. LILLY CHROME never menaced throughout. C V THUNDER tried to keep up to no avail. SWEET TOOTSIE LU never menaced.

ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up to no avail

ENTRY.NAME: My Angelica
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back to the stretch, moved up late for show spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 12700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since March 27, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferr ed).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SARGEANT BARGER dueled early on, took over to run away late in good fashion. POUR ME A DOUBLE speed to the front, could not handle winner while best of rest. MISTER MAN never far back to the turn, moved up for show spot. VASILEVSKIY (IRE) no speed to the turn with late advance in the stretch run. BLACKSMITH STRONG raced evenly along with no response in the stretch run. HEY RAY trailed to the half while no threat throughout. MAMBA TWENTY FOUR broke sharp inside with a steady fade throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Mamba Twenty Four
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp inside with a steady fade throughout

ENTRY.OWNER: Giesy Jerry and Danner Douglas W

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 95. Starter Allowance Purse 14500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since March 27, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Rac es For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EL BOHEMIO perfect spot to the turn, rallied along in the stretch, cleared. CUT GLASS unhurried early, rallied from the turn for place spot late. FRISCO LINE no speed to the stretch, came running late for show spot. FLAT FUN had a slow start from the gate, rallied to improve position from the turn to the wire D'MONEY HONEY close up to the turn, no late response when needed. LIMIT UP dueled to mid stretch, gave in through the final furlong. ELLE'SBIGSEACRET dueled to the stretch, used up and weakened in final furlong. ZIP IT SCOTTY through early, faded back readily. ARMY SCOUT never a menace throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Army Scout
ENTRY.COMMENT: never a menace throughout

ENTRY.COMMENT: perfect spot to the turn, rallied along in the stretch, cleared

ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled to the stretch, used up and weakened in final furlong

ENTRY.COMMENT: through early, faded back readily

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RILEY BEE ran up outside to turn, dueled all with an energetic ride to the wire. OUTSLEWTHEM outside run to turn, rallied in earnest, battled winner while no match. LET IT RIDE CLYDE raced along evenly throughout to garner the show spot. DANG IT CAIN awkward start, rushed inside to turn, leveled off in the stretch. GOOD SOUL never prominent throughout. BUDDHA BOY inside speed, dueled to the quarter pole, emptied out stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Buddha Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, dueled to the quarter pole, emptied out stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Let It Ride Clyde
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly throughout to garner the show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Outslewthem
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside run to turn, rallied in earnest, battled winner no match

ENTRY.NAME: Good Soul
ENTRY.COMMENT: never prominent throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Dang It Cain
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, rushed inside to turn, leveled off in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Riley Bee
ENTRY.COMMENT: ran up outside to turn, dueled all out with energetic ride late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since March 27, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferre d).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FARZIN unhurried to the turn, rallied, split horses late, got up on wire. MUTUAL CONFIDENCE between foes to turn, split foes quarter pole led in the late going but outkicked to the wire. A LATE ONE stayed on from off rail to the turn, came five wide into stretch while staying on gamely to the wire. THREE MILE LIMIT inside speed, stayed game to deep stretch but gave in through the late stages. HINK'S PALADIN inside trip to turn with a bid but leveled off in the stretch run. DUDLEY outside run to the turn, tried to keep up, leveled off in stretch. LILY'S TRUMPET lunged at the start while never recovering, lost best chance. CAPE MARCO DRIVE pinched a bit start raced far back throughout no late gain. CANTANKEROUS BOBBY off rail duel to turn, gave in readily with nothing left.

ENTRY.NAME: Hink's Paladin
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip to turn with a bid but leveled off in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Cape Marco Drive
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinched a bit start raced far back throughout no late gain

ENTRY.NAME: Farzin
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to the turn, rallied, split horses late, got up on wire

ENTRY.NAME: Three Mile Limit
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, stayed game to deep stretch, gave in late stages

ENTRY.NAME: Mutual Confidence
ENTRY.COMMENT: between foes to turn, split foes quarter pole led late outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Cantankerous Bobby
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail duel to turn, gave in readily with nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Lily's Trumpet
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunged at the start while never recovering, lost best chance

ENTRY.NAME: A Late One
ENTRY.OWNER: Grayson Jr Bob Crown Racing Stable and Matejka Pavel
ENTRY.COMMENT: stayed on off rail to the stretch, five wide into stretch, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Dudley
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside run to the turn, tried to keep up, leveled off in stretch
